items.title: Background and standard buttons
items.description: This is the dominant colour of your shop.

items.title: Header & footer
items.description: Background in the header and footer.

items.title: Accent
items.description: Highlights important elements, such as the buy button.

items.title: Main font
items.description: The main font used throughout your shop. You can either choose one of the built-in fonts or load one from Google Fonts.

preview.text: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog

strings.dropDown: Select a font from the drown-down menu below and, if you want, change the example text and size (only for previewing).
strings.customFontDesc:
To load a font from Google Fonts, do the following:
  1. Go to http://www.google.com/fonts.
  2. Choose a font and click on the icon for Quick-use (the icon looks like an arrow to the right).
  3. Choose styles and character sets in step 1 and 2. Copy the code from step 3.
  4. Paste the code below and click "Load".

items.title: Accent font
items.description: Highlights important elements such as headlines. You can either choose one of the built-in fonts or load one from Google Fonts.

preview.text: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog

strings.dropDown: Select a font from the drown-down menu below and, if you want, change the example text and size (only for previewing).
strings.customFontDesc:
To load a font from Google Fonts, do the following:
  1. Go to http://www.google.com/fonts.
  2. Choose a font and click on the icon for Quick-use (the icon looks like an arrow to the right).
  3. Choose styles and character sets in step 1 and 2. Copy the code from step 3.
  4. Paste the code below and click "Load".

tabs.title: Logo
tabs.description: You can have an image, text or image with text over it as your logo.

items.description: Enter your Web Property ID to enable Google Analytics.
items.validationMessage: This is not a valid Web Property ID.

items.title: Custom CSS
items.description: The CSS entered here is applied site wide and at your own risk.

tabs.title: Header
tabs.description: Here you can add contact and shipping information, etc. that are shown at the absolute top of the page.

tws-login.title: Customer login
tws-login.description: Enable your customers to create an account and log in to your shop?

tws-login.helpvalue: You don't have the required functionalities for this component.

tws-custom-html.title: Contact
tws-custom-html.description: Phone number to your customer service or other contact information. A single row at the top of the page.

tws-custom-html.title: Shipping information
tws-custom-html.description: A single row at the top of the page.

tabs.title: Footer
tabs.description: The footer is always located at the bottom of the page.

items.title: Address
items.description: You can add up to five address lines.

items.title: Phone number (human readable)
items.description: The number as shown to your visitors, e.g. 012 345 6789

items.title: Phone number (computer readable)
items.validationMessage: The number must start with a country code (e.g. +44) and may not contain spaces.
items.description: The number that should be dialed when a visitor clicks on it, e.g. +44123456789.

items.title: Menu
items.description: The menu is a central component of your shop that your visitors will use to look though your inventory. With the settings below you can customize both the look and content of the menu. Please note that certain settings may be inappropriate if you have many article groups on the top level.

tws-top-menu.title: Menu style
tws-top-menu.description: The menu is available in two different styles.

tws-top-menu.title: Menu items
tws-top-menu.description: Click "Add" below to add new items to the menu, then use drag and drop to re-arrange.

tabs.title: Shout out
tabs.description: Shout out the latest in a text-only promotion box.

tabs.title: Promotion boxes
tabs.description: With promotion boxes you can raise customer awareness of, for example, a particular brand, a sales campaign or perhaps a new section of your shop.

tabs.title: Highlighted articles
tabs.description: Here you can promote certain articles on the start page.

tabs.title: Article page
tabs.description: Here you can adjust how individual articles are presented.

tws-article.title: Options or variants
tws-article.description: You can display article choices either as individual options (e.g. "Colour" and "Size") or as variants. The latter are combinations of options, e.g. "Red shirt XL".

items.title: Maximum variants
items.description: Set a maximum number of unique variants. If you exceed this limit, then they will all show up as options instead.

tabs.title: Article-group page
tabs.description: An article-group page can list sub groups, articles or both.

items.title: Grid or list
items.description: Show sub groups in a grid or a list.

items.title: Pagination
items.description: You can choose between classic pagination or infinite scroll, where sub groups are loaded automatically.

items.title: Grid or list
items.description: Show articles in a grid or a list.

items.title: Pagination
items.description: You can choose between classic pagination or infinite scroll, where articles are loaded automatically.

items.helpvalue: Here you can normally make theme-specific settings related to your checkout section. Your shop, however, currently lacks the required features.
Here you can make theme-specific settings related to your checkout section.

tws-checkout.title: Discount codes
tws-checkout.description: Here you can enable discount codes for the current theme. To create and manage your discount codes, click here.
